mapper.update: MERGE INTO TAG USING DUAL ON (TRIM(TAG_NAME)=#{tagTemp}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TAG_COUNT = TAG_COUNT+1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (TAG_NO, TAG_NAME, TAG_COUNT, TAG_DATE) VALUES ('TAG' || LPAD(SEQ_TAG_NO.NEXTVAL,5,0), #{tagTemp}, 1, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT TAG_NAME FROM TAG T JOIN GTAG G ON G.TAG_NO = T.TAG_NO JOIN GROOMING GR ON G.GROOMING_NO = GR.GROOMING_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = GR.MEMBER_NO WHERE GR.GROOMING_NO= #{groomingNo}
